The mean control reproduction number was estimated to be as high as 6.47 (95% CI 5.71–7.23), in comparison with= 4.91 R0(R0 = 3.5–6.7) and Riyadh (R0 Our value is higher than other published estimates (for instance, Reference [28]). Such a high reproduction number is consistent with the opinion that the virus has gone
